subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
Series
Aviation Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Yaroslavl Lokomotiv, the Russian hockey team that lost 37 players, coaches and support staff members in an accident last year, has resurrected its roster and is in third place in the K.H.L. Western Conference.
snippet: Yaroslavl Lokomotiv, the Russian hockey team that lost 37 players, coaches and support staff members in an accident last year, has resurrected its roster and is in third place in the K.H.L. Western Conference.
